alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gilmer and eastern Fannin Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Dial, or 7 miles southeast of Blue Ridge, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Blue Ridge, Morganton, Dial, Hemp, Margret, Pisgah and Hurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
